```{r install.packages, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(quarto)
library(dplyr)
library(devtools)
library(readr)
library(gt) #for tables
library(stringr)
library(htmltools)
library(data.table)
```

```{r load_data, echo = FALSE}
data2018 <- readRDS("data/PINCommEngData (2).RData")

JRP <- data2018 %>% 
  filter(Collectors == "JRP;",
         SiteVisitID == "JanS5-20189692326")
```

## Run Date: `r unique(JRP$RunDate)` \| Run Code: `r unique(JRP$RunCode)`

### Site Code: `r unique(JRP$SiteCode)`

```{r echo = FALSE}
JRP %>% 
  select(RunCode, SiteCode, Collectors) %>% 
  distinct() %>% 
  gt()
```
